first.title: Massage
first.text: Book an on-demand massage at home, in your hotel room, or at your office, from our app or .com.

second.title: Assisted  Stretch
second.text: Choose the massage type and the gender of your therapist, and he or she will arrive with a massage table.

first.title: Massage
first.text: A restorative technique that relieves stress, boosts circulation, and eases muscle aches and pains.

second.title: Deep Tissue
second.text: A stronger style that focuses on deeper muscle tension and knots - perfect for athletic recovery.

third.title: Prenatal
third.text: A gentle modality designed to boost wellness and relieve the physical strains of pregnancy.

locationTab.subText: Address your massage will take place

tabel.label: Do you have a massage table?

timeTab.header: When would you like to book?
timeTab.slotText: We’ll book you with the best available therapist during your preferred time slot.

third.contactInfo: Monthly 60-min massage Priority Customer Support 12 month commitment

first.title: Add Mailing Address
first.body: Provide a mailing address to receive future membership perks. Please ensure packages can be accepted at this location.

second.title: Add Payment
second.body: Select your payment method and add details.

cards.cancelHeader: Cancel up to 4 hours in advance

discalimer.first: We will pre-authorize a hold on your payment method for the total amount above and charge for it after your appointment is completed.By selecting 'Add Payment', I confirm that I have read and agreed  Member Agreement and commit to at least 2 monthly charges of $140.42.
discalimer.second: By selecting Add Payment, I confirm that I have read and agreed  Member Agreement and commit to at least 2 monthly charges of $140.42.
